description: This file defines React functional components for layout elements such as Header, Sidebar, Footer, and Container for a Tic Tac Toe web application frontend built with Next.js. It handles UI structure, navigation links, and user authentication display logic.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: Renders the header with site title and navigation links, including login/logout functionality.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Renders a sidebar container that displays children components, hidden on small screens.

methods.name: Footer
methods.description: Renders the footer with current year and site info.

methods.name: Container
methods.description: Wraps page content with header, footer, and layout styling.
